title: Howard Bryant on Rickey Henderson and Diversity (Podcast)
itunes:title: Howard Bryant on Rickey Henderson and Diversity (Podcast)
description:
Hosts Michael Barr and Scarlet Fu welcome ESPN senior writer Howard Bryant to talk about his latest book, "Rickey: The Life and Legend of an American Original", on baseball great Rickey Henderson's legacy. The conversation included thoughts on diversity in baseball and the state of the sport.

They also spoke with Bloomberg's Seth Magalaner, who produced a documentary on Black pitchers.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
